title: Local web-based energy monitoring using a wireless protocol
description: A system that measures electrical energy using a power meter, processes the data with a Raspberry Pi, and presents the energy usage through a local web-based interface.

title: Chicken Egg Incubator Using AC Lamp and PID Control Prototype
description: A monitoring and control system utilizing the DS18B20 temperature sensor to maintain a stable chicken coop environment, ensuring optimal growth, health, and productivity of the chickens through consistent temperature regulation.

title: Line Follower Robot
description: Designed and implemented an autonomous line-following robot using infrared sensors and ATMega32 microcontroller. The system was programmed to detect and follow a predefined path accurately, with real-time motor control based on sensor feedback.

title: Automatic Door and Welcome Bell Prototype
description: Designed and implemented a door system equipped with infrared and ultrasonic sensors to accurately detect the presence of people, triggering both the automatic door mechanism and a greeting bell to enhance convenience and user experience.
